item.title: Writing Python Functions
item.description: Writing functions in Python is an incredibly useful skill, it allows you to bundle a set of instructions so that you can repeatedly use them in a variety of contexts. This means you donâ€™t have to rewrite complicated code over and over, or saves you time if you will know you will have to use a specific function repeatedly. The below code counts characters in a string! sentence = "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
